body:
This is not associated with any official Avicus services.

Hi there. I'd like to introduce MapStack.

MapStack is a general hub (or repository) with the purpose of allowing the community to download maps to play with friends or for scrimmages - all in one central area. Here you're able to easily search for maps you want by name, or by game mode.

This is where you guys come in! If you've created a map and would like to have it added to MapStack, please post your map, along with a link to the original forum thread, and a download (if the thread didn't have one). Please do not post a map unless it is your own.

You can also create a pull-request and add your map yourself on our repository (please read CONTRIBUTING.md). This makes it much easier for us.

By default all maps will have a CC BY-SA licence. Alternatively, your map can have a CC BY-NC-SA license. Please specify if you'd rather this one when submitting maps.

If you have any friends who are map makers, share this forum topic with them. The more maps we get, the more maps you'll have available to download.

I'd like to thank {tag=48924ea33aad4e16838c368d8d9e0a25} and {tag=f690a591348b482ea18d7779d0c0a28c} for making this all possible, and helping out so much with everything.

title: Introducing MapStack!

replies.body: Are you only looking for maps that were accepted to the server? And do you want the XML included?
replies.body_tagged: Are you only looking for maps that were accepted to the server? And do you want the XML included?

replies.body: The collection includes maps that are from the Avicus network. Any map loaded in the Avicus map repository even if its currently not on rotations so maps accepted to Avicus. The XML can be included and its nice if it is but its not a requirement.

replies.body:
Update on the project
There are currently 14 maps available on MapStack from the official Avicus network repository.

If anyone has a map in the official repository then it would be very appreciated if you could submit it,

We've also started accepting unofficial maps (check Overcast Unofficial Repository). If any map makers are interested in submitting their maps to the unofficial list (maps made for Avicus but not in official repository), then it would be very appreciated. Currently theres no unofficial Avicus maps submitted so theres no page for it (so i linked Overcast one).
replies.body_tagged:
